profile.title: profile
profile.content: Stemming from a background in biological sciences, I am a detail-oriented software engineer with experience developing high-performing applications and web-based solutions. Seeking a position as a front-end developer in an environment that encourages innovative thinking and career development.

employmentHistory.role: Served as an onsite consultant developer for an online travel agency conglomerate, working closely with product and engineering teams to
achievements: Develop a dynamic chrome extension capable of serving as a software adapter within the client’s data platform tool, allowing authorized marketing/product teams to browse a client’s subsidiary site to explore and access supplemental resources that facilitate their day-to-day operations.

Develop a suite of applications capable of providing context-aware UI, allowing authorized business intelligence teams to browse/interact with the client’s subsidiary sites to access additional internal analytics used to assess a brand’s performance.

employmentHistory.role: Served as an onsite developer for an internet privacy and security solutions provider, working closely with design, engineering, marketing, and product teams to
achievements: Promote and assist in the development of an internal pattern library to systematize and unify design patterns across the company’s subsidiary brands, leading to more efficient development cycles and improved collaboration between creative and engineering teams.

Develop new UI elements and user-facing features for the company’s subsidiary sites and retrofit architecture/applications to modern development practices, supporting a more flexible and maintainable codebase.

employmentHistory.role: Developed for an online communications firm and digital marketing agency, collaborating with design, business, and marketing teams to
achievements: Develop new UI features for various custom applications while providing technical advice for the marketing team, resolving existing internal/external defects while reducing the engineering team's overall tech debt footprint.

employmentHistory.role: Developed for a consulting services agency, coordinating with in-house development teams to
achievements: Participate in daily scrums to gathering user requirements, plan projects, design prototypes, and plan project lifecycles, while debugging and developing multiple existing internal applications.
